mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CommunityMembers ( community_id, user_id, role_id, status, fav_flg ) VALUES ( #{communityId}, #{userId}, #{role}, #{status}, #{fav} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE role_id = #{role}, status = #{status}, fav_flg = #{fav};
mapper.select: SELECT community_id as communityId ,user_id as userId ,role_id as role ,status as status ,fav_flg as fav FROM CommunityMembers WHERE community_id = #{communityId} AND user_id = #{userId}
